Nightlight::

Nightlight arrived to Cr's she entered and looked surpriced around 
said "What's going on here?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Wheeljack-X::
> 
> "What in the blue hell ..." Wheeljack trails off as he enters the 
room 
> and sees for himself.  "Ho-kay!  I didn't haul your skidplate in 
off 
> the battlefield just so you could start a demolition derby!"
> 
> He fires a pair of magneto-shells to try and short out the berserk 
> Maximal's systems.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > Nightlight had the firm decition to help her fellows maximals, so 
> she 
> > moved towards Cr's. She heard the battle inside and she felt fear 
> for 
> > Rodimus, she knew that he could care himself... but she couldn't 
> > avoid to feel fear.
> > 
> > She moved quickly towards Cr's room
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Eric Bischoff" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> > > : : Razael : :
> > > 
> > > Razael went to put her gun away when Blackfang attacked Kup. 
> > > 
> > > Razael:  No!  Kup!  Get off him, you monster!
> > > 
> > > She fires three shots from her ener-gun at Blackfang.
